column2:
df_ind_cond <- df %>%                                                                                         
  group_by(subid, speed, direction) %>%
  summarise(M_te = mean(TimeError, na.rm=T),
            SD_te = sd(TimeError, na.rm = T),
            M_abs_te = mean(AbsTimeError, na.rm=T),
            SD_abs_te = sd(AbsTimeError, na.rm = T)) %>%
  ungroup()
